issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: Request log records full contents for POST requests (SOAP messages, etc)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Any POST request is spit out in the cloud-request.log with its body. 

{noformat}
